  // å¤„ç†HTMLæ ¼å¼PDFä¸‹è½½
  const handlePDFDownload = (resourceId: string) => {
    // ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼çš„PDFå†…å®¹ï¼Œæä¾›æ›´å¥½çš„å±å¹•é˜…è¯»ä½“éªŒ
    const htmlFilename = `${resourceId}.html`;
    const url = `/pdf-files/${htmlFilename}`;

    console.log(`ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼PDF: ${resourceId} -> ${htmlFilename}`);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = htmlFilename;
    link.target = '_blank';
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
  };

  // å¤„ç†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'
      ? `æ¨èè¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ç»æœŸå¥åº·èµ„æºï¼š${resource.title}`

    const shareData = {
      title: `Period Hub - ${resource.title}`,
      text: shareText,
      url: window.location.href

    try {
      if (navigator.share && navigator.canShare && navigator.canShare(shareData)) {
        await navigator.share(shareData);
      } else {
        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥:', error);
      // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
      try {
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);

  };

  // åˆ†ç±»åŒºåŸŸç»„ä»¶

      'ç–¼', 'ç—›', 'ç°åœ¨', 'é©¬ä¸Š', 'ç¼“è§£', 'å¿«é€Ÿ', 'ç«‹å³', 'ç´§æ€¥', 'æ€¥', 'ç–¼å¾—å‰å®³'

      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'çƒ­æ•·å‡†å¤‡', 'çƒ­æ•·å·¥å…·', 'çƒ­æ•·ç”¨å“', 'æš–å®å®å‡†å¤‡',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'æŒ‰æ‘©å‡†å¤‡', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å·¥å…·', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ '

    const learningKeywords = [
      'åŒ»ç”Ÿ', 'åŒ»å­¦', 'å°±åŒ»', 'å‘¨æœŸ', 'äº†è§£', 'æŒ‡å—', 'æ•™è‚²', 'çŸ¥è¯†', 'å­¦ä¹ ', 'ç ”ç©¶', 'ç§‘å­¦', 'å¾ªè¯', 'è¯Šæ–­', 'æ£€æŸ¥',
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      'çƒ­æ•·æ–¹æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æŠ€å·§', 'çƒ­æ•·åŸç†', 'çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ ',

    const managementKeywords = [

      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      'çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†', 'çƒ­æ•·è®°å½•', 'çƒ­æ•·è®¡åˆ’', 'çƒ­æ•·è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      'æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®°å½•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®¡åˆ’', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è·Ÿè¸ª',

  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {

        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);

      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'
      ? `æ¨èè¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ç»æœŸå¥åº·èµ„æºï¼š${resource.title}`

      } else {
        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥:', error);

      'ç–¼', 'ç—›', 'ç°åœ¨', 'é©¬ä¸Š', 'ç¼“è§£', 'å¿«é€Ÿ', 'ç«‹å³', 'ç´§æ€¥', 'æ€¥', 'ç–¼å¾—å‰å®³'

    const preparationKeywords = [

      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'çƒ­æ•·å‡†å¤‡', 'çƒ­æ•·å·¥å…·', 'çƒ­æ•·ç”¨å“', 'æš–å®å®å‡†å¤‡',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'æŒ‰æ‘©å‡†å¤‡', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å·¥å…·', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      'åŒ»ç”Ÿ', 'åŒ»å­¦', 'å°±åŒ»', 'å‘¨æœŸ', 'äº†è§£', 'æŒ‡å—', 'æ•™è‚²', 'çŸ¥è¯†', 'å­¦ä¹ ', 'ç ”ç©¶', 'ç§‘å­¦', 'å¾ªè¯', 'è¯Šæ–­', 'æ£€æŸ¥',
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      'çƒ­æ•·æ–¹æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æŠ€å·§', 'çƒ­æ•·åŸç†', 'çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ ',

    const managementKeywords = [
      'é•¿æœŸ', 'ç®¡ç†', 'ç”Ÿæ´»', 'æ¡£æ¡ˆ', 'è®°å½•', 'æŒç»­', 'è·Ÿè¸ª', 'ç›‘æµ‹', 'åˆ†æ', 'æŠ¥å‘Š', 'æ¨¡æ¿',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      'çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†', 'çƒ­æ•·è®°å½•', 'çƒ­æ•·è®¡åˆ’', 'çƒ­æ•·è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      'æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®°å½•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®¡åˆ’', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è·Ÿè¸ª',

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½

  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'

        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');

      'çƒ­æ•·', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®', 'æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯',

      'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—',

      'NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©',
      // å…¶ä»–ç´§æ€¥ç›¸å…³è¯æ±‡
      'ç–¼', 'ç—›', 'ç°åœ¨', 'é©¬ä¸Š', 'ç¼“è§£', 'å¿«é€Ÿ', 'ç«‹å³', 'ç´§æ€¥', 'æ€¥', 'ç–¼å¾—å‰å®³'
    ];
    
    const preparationKeywords = [
      'è¥å…»', 'é¥®é£Ÿ', 'è¿åŠ¨', 'ä¹ æƒ¯', 'å‡†å¤‡', 'é¢„é˜²', 'è®¡åˆ’', 'æå‰', 'å…»ç”Ÿ', 'å¥åº·', 'é”»ç‚¼', 'ç‘œä¼½', 'å…«æ®µé”¦',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'çƒ­æ•·å‡†å¤‡', 'çƒ­æ•·å·¥å…·', 'çƒ­æ•·ç”¨å“', 'æš–å®å®å‡†å¤‡',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'æŒ‰æ‘©å‡†å¤‡', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å·¥å…·', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      'åŒ»ç”Ÿ', 'åŒ»å­¦', 'å°±åŒ»', 'å‘¨æœŸ', 'äº†è§£', 'æŒ‡å—', 'æ•™è‚²', 'çŸ¥è¯†', 'å­¦ä¹ ', 'ç ”ç©¶', 'ç§‘å­¦', 'å¾ªè¯', 'è¯Šæ–­', 'æ£€æŸ¥',
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      'çƒ­æ•·æ–¹æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æŠ€å·§', 'çƒ­æ•·åŸç†', 'çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ ',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      'æŒ‰æ‘©æ–¹æ³•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©åŸç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ ',
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      'è¯ç‰©çŸ¥è¯†', 'ç”¨è¯æŒ‡å—', 'è¯ç‰©å¯¹æ¯”', 'ç”¨è¯å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      'é•¿æœŸ', 'ç®¡ç†', 'ç”Ÿæ´»', 'æ¡£æ¡ˆ', 'è®°å½•', 'æŒç»­', 'è·Ÿè¸ª', 'ç›‘æµ‹', 'åˆ†æ', 'æŠ¥å‘Š', 'æ¨¡æ¿',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      'çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†', 'çƒ­æ•·è®°å½•', 'çƒ­æ•·è®¡åˆ’', 'çƒ­æ•·è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      'æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®°å½•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®¡åˆ’', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      'ç”¨è¯ç®¡ç†', 'ç”¨è¯è®°å½•', 'ç”¨è¯è®¡åˆ’', 'ç”¨è¯è·Ÿè¸ª'

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {

  "faq": {
    "title": "Frequently Asked Questions",
    "subtitle": "Find answers to common questions about menstrual health",
    "q1": {
      "question": "What are the fastest ways to relieve menstrual cramps?",
      "answer": "The fastest menstrual cramp relief methods include: heat therapy on lower abdomen and back, gentle abdominal massage, light exercise like yoga, NSAIDs like ibuprofen, and adequate rest. Combining multiple methods works best."
    },
    "q2": {
      "question": "What is considered a normal menstrual cycle?",
      "answer": "A normal menstrual cycle ranges from 21-35 days, with an average of 28 days. Menstruation typically lasts 3-7 days. Consult a gynecologist if cycles are consistently irregular."
    },
    "q3": {
      "question": "How does Traditional Chinese Medicine treat irregular periods?",
      "answer": "TCM treats irregular periods through syndrome differentiation: acupuncture to regulate qi and blood, herbal formulas, dietary therapy, and lifestyle adjustments. Professional TCM diagnosis is needed for personalized treatment."
    },
    "q4": {
      "question": "When is the most effective time to take Ibuprofen?",
      "answer": "Ibuprofen is most effective when taken at the onset of pain, typically taking effect in 30-60 minutes. It's recommended to take it when pain first starts or when you anticipate pain coming, rather than waiting until the pain becomes severe."
    },
    "q5": {
      "question": "How many times can I take Ibuprofen per day?",
      "answer": "Ibuprofen can be taken every 6-8 hours, up to 4 times per day. Adult single dose is 200-400mg, with a maximum total daily dose of 2400mg. Do not use continuously for more than 3 days; consult a doctor if pain persists."
    },
    "q6": {
      "question": "Which has fewer side effects: Naproxen or Ibuprofen?",
      "answer": "Naproxen typically has fewer side effects because it's taken less frequently (every 8-12 hours). However, both may cause stomach discomfort, so it's recommended to take with food. Those with stomach, heart, or kidney/liver problems should use with caution."
    },
    "q7": {
      "question": "Can I take both Ibuprofen and Naproxen together for period pain?",
      "answer": "It's not recommended to take both Ibuprofen and Naproxen together as they are both NSAIDs, which increases the risk of side effects. Choose one medication, and if it's not effective, consult a doctor to adjust your medication plan."
    }
  },

      // ä¸“ä¸šæœ¯è¯­æ˜ å°„
      'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—',

      'NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©',
      // å…¶ä»–ç´§æ€¥ç›¸å…³è¯æ±‡
      'ç–¼', 'ç—›', 'ç°åœ¨', 'é©¬ä¸Š', 'ç¼“è§£', 'å¿«é€Ÿ', 'ç«‹å³', 'ç´§æ€¥', 'æ€¥', 'ç–¼å¾—å‰å®³'
    ];
    
    const preparationKeywords = [
      'è¥å…»', 'é¥®é£Ÿ', 'è¿åŠ¨', 'ä¹ æƒ¯', 'å‡†å¤‡', 'é¢„é˜²', 'è®¡åˆ’', 'æå‰', 'å…»ç”Ÿ', 'å¥åº·', 'é”»ç‚¼', 'ç‘œä¼½', 'å…«æ®µé”¦',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'çƒ­æ•·å‡†å¤‡', 'çƒ­æ•·å·¥å…·', 'çƒ­æ•·ç”¨å“', 'æš–å®å®å‡†å¤‡',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'æŒ‰æ‘©å‡†å¤‡', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å·¥å…·', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      'åŒ»ç”Ÿ', 'åŒ»å­¦', 'å°±åŒ»', 'å‘¨æœŸ', 'äº†è§£', 'æŒ‡å—', 'æ•™è‚²', 'çŸ¥è¯†', 'å­¦ä¹ ', 'ç ”ç©¶', 'ç§‘å­¦', 'å¾ªè¯', 'è¯Šæ–­', 'æ£€æŸ¥',
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      'çƒ­æ•·æ–¹æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æŠ€å·§', 'çƒ­æ•·åŸç†', 'çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ ',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      'æŒ‰æ‘©æ–¹æ³•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©åŸç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ ',
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      'è¯ç‰©çŸ¥è¯†', 'ç”¨è¯æŒ‡å—', 'è¯ç‰©å¯¹æ¯”', 'ç”¨è¯å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      'é•¿æœŸ', 'ç®¡ç†', 'ç”Ÿæ´»', 'æ¡£æ¡ˆ', 'è®°å½•', 'æŒç»­', 'è·Ÿè¸ª', 'ç›‘æµ‹', 'åˆ†æ', 'æŠ¥å‘Š', 'æ¨¡æ¿',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      'çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†', 'çƒ­æ•·è®°å½•', 'çƒ­æ•·è®¡åˆ’', 'çƒ­æ•·è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      'æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®°å½•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®¡åˆ’', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      'ç”¨è¯ç®¡ç†', 'ç”¨è¯è®°å½•', 'ç”¨è¯è®¡åˆ’', 'ç”¨è¯è·Ÿè¸ª'

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {

        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);

      'è¥å…»', 'é¥®é£Ÿ', 'è¿åŠ¨', 'ä¹ æƒ¯', 'å‡†å¤‡', 'é¢„é˜²', 'è®¡åˆ’', 'æå‰', 'å…»ç”Ÿ', 'å¥åº·', 'é”»ç‚¼', 'ç‘œä¼½', 'å…«æ®µé”¦',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'çƒ­æ•·å‡†å¤‡', 'çƒ­æ•·å·¥å…·', 'çƒ­æ•·ç”¨å“', 'æš–å®å®å‡†å¤‡',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      'æŒ‰æ‘©å‡†å¤‡', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å·¥å…·', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      'åŒ»ç”Ÿ', 'åŒ»å­¦', 'å°±åŒ»', 'å‘¨æœŸ', 'äº†è§£', 'æŒ‡å—', 'æ•™è‚²', 'çŸ¥è¯†', 'å­¦ä¹ ', 'ç ”ç©¶', 'ç§‘å­¦', 'å¾ªè¯', 'è¯Šæ–­', 'æ£€æŸ¥',
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      'çƒ­æ•·æ–¹æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æŠ€å·§', 'çƒ­æ•·åŸç†', 'çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ ',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      'æŒ‰æ‘©æ–¹æ³•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©æŠ€å·§', 'æŒ‰æ‘©åŸç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ ',
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      'è¯ç‰©çŸ¥è¯†', 'ç”¨è¯æŒ‡å—', 'è¯ç‰©å¯¹æ¯”', 'ç”¨è¯å­¦ä¹ '
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      'é•¿æœŸ', 'ç®¡ç†', 'ç”Ÿæ´»', 'æ¡£æ¡ˆ', 'è®°å½•', 'æŒç»­', 'è·Ÿè¸ª', 'ç›‘æµ‹', 'åˆ†æ', 'æŠ¥å‘Š', 'æ¨¡æ¿',
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      'çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†', 'çƒ­æ•·è®°å½•', 'çƒ­æ•·è®¡åˆ’', 'çƒ­æ•·è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      'æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®°å½•', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è®¡åˆ’', 'æŒ‰æ‘©è·Ÿè¸ª',
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      'ç”¨è¯ç®¡ç†', 'ç”¨è¯è®°å½•', 'ç”¨è¯è®¡åˆ’', 'ç”¨è¯è·Ÿè¸ª'
    ];

    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    if (urgentKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

    const isUrgent = urgentTerms.some(term => searchTerm.includes(term));

  const handlePDFDownload = (resourceId: string) => {

    const htmlFilename = `${resourceId}.html`;
    const url = `/pdf-files/${htmlFilename}`;

    console.log(`ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼PDF: ${resourceId} -> ${htmlFilename}`);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
    const link = document.createElement('a');

  // å¤„ç†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'

      } else {
        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥:', error);

      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  // æ¸è¿›å¼åŠ è½½
  useEffect(() => {

  useEffect(() => {
    const urgentTerms = ['ç–¼', 'ç—›', 'ç°åœ¨', 'é©¬ä¸Š', 'æ€¥', 'çƒ­æ•·', 'æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç´§æ€¥', 'ç–¼å¾—å‰å®³'];
    const isUrgent = urgentTerms.some(term => searchTerm.includes(term));

  };

  const getPDFFilename = (resourceId: string): string => {
    // ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨resourceIdï¼Œå› ä¸ºPDFèµ„æºå·²ç»ä½¿ç”¨äº†é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ­£ç¡®ID

  const handlePDFDownload = (resourceId: string) => {
    // ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼çš„PDFå†…å®¹ï¼Œæä¾›æ›´å¥½çš„å±å¹•é˜…è¯»ä½“éªŒ
    const htmlFilename = `${resourceId}.html`;
    const url = `/pdf-files/${htmlFilename}`;

    console.log(`ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼PDF: ${resourceId} -> ${htmlFilename}`);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = htmlFilename;
    link.target = '_blank';

    link.click();

  // å¤„ç†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'
      ? `æ¨èè¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ç»æœŸå¥åº·èµ„æºï¼š${resource.title}`

      } else {
        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {

        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type

      let maxPossibleScore = 0;

          });

  "faq": {
    "title": "Frequently Asked Questions",
    "subtitle": "Find answers to common questions about menstrual health",
    "q1": {
      "question": "What are the fastest ways to relieve menstrual cramps?",
      "answer": "The fastest menstrual cramp relief methods include: heat therapy on lower abdomen and back, gentle abdominal massage, light exercise like yoga, NSAIDs like ibuprofen, and adequate rest. Combining multiple methods works best."
    },
    "q2": {
      "question": "What is considered a normal menstrual cycle?",
      "answer": "A normal menstrual cycle ranges from 21-35 days, with an average of 28 days. Menstruation typically lasts 3-7 days. Consult a gynecologist if cycles are consistently irregular."
    },
    "q3": {
      "question": "How does Traditional Chinese Medicine treat irregular periods?",
      "answer": "TCM treats irregular periods through syndrome differentiation: acupuncture to regulate qi and blood, herbal formulas, dietary therapy, and lifestyle adjustments. Professional TCM diagnosis is needed for personalized treatment."
    },
    "q4": {
      "question": "When is the most effective time to take Ibuprofen?",
      "answer": "Ibuprofen is most effective when taken at the onset of pain, typically taking effect in 30-60 minutes. It's recommended to take it when pain first starts or when you anticipate pain coming, rather than waiting until the pain becomes severe."
    },
    "q5": {
      "question": "How many times can I take Ibuprofen per day?",
      "answer": "Ibuprofen can be taken every 6-8 hours, up to 4 times per day. Adult single dose is 200-400mg, with a maximum total daily dose of 2400mg. Do not use continuously for more than 3 days; consult a doctor if pain persists."
    },
    "q6": {
      "question": "Which has fewer side effects: Naproxen or Ibuprofen?",
      "answer": "Naproxen typically has fewer side effects because it's taken less frequently (every 8-12 hours). However, both may cause stomach discomfort, so it's recommended to take with food. Those with stomach, heart, or kidney/liver problems should use with caution."
    },
    "q7": {
      "question": "Can I take both Ibuprofen and Naproxen together for period pain?",
      "answer": "It's not recommended to take both Ibuprofen and Naproxen together as they are both NSAIDs, which increases the risk of side effects. Choose one medication, and if it's not effective, consult a doctor to adjust your medication plan."
    }
  },

  // æ™ºèƒ½æœç´¢ç®—æ³•
  const semanticSearch = useMemo(() => {
    // æ•´åˆ6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯çš„è¯­ä¹‰æ˜ å°„
    const urgentKeywords = [
      // 6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯åŠå…¶åŒä¹‰è¯
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.core'),
      // ä¸“ä¸šæœ¯è¯­æ˜ å°„
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.professional'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.massage'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.medication'),
      // å…¶ä»–ç´§æ€¥ç›¸å…³è¯æ±‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.emergency')
    ];
    
    const preparationKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.massage')
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.medication')
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.medication')
    ];

    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    if (urgentKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      'çƒ­æ•·': ['çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­ç–—', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·æ²»ç–—', 'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹', 'æš–å®å®'],
      'æŒ‰æ‘©': ['ç©´ä½æŒ‰å‹', 'è‚Œè‚‰æ”¾æ¾', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©', 'æ‰è‚šå­'],
      'æ­¢ç—›è¯': ['NSAID', 'éç”¾ä½“æŠ—ç‚è¯', 'å¸ƒæ´›èŠ¬', 'å¯¹ä¹™é…°æ°¨åŸºé…š', 'æ­¢ç—›è¯ç‰©', 'è¯ç‰©'],
      'æš–å®å®': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•'],
      'æ‰è‚šå­': ['æŒ‰æ‘©', 'è…¹éƒ¨æŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç»æœŸæŒ‰æ‘©', 'ç–¼ç—›æŒ‰æ‘©'],
      'æ•·çƒ­æ°´è¢‹': ['çƒ­æ•·', 'çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'æ¸©çƒ­ç–—æ³•', 'çƒ­æ•·ç–—æ³•']
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  // å¤„ç†HTMLæ ¼å¼PDFä¸‹è½½
  const handlePDFDownload = (resourceId: string) => {

    console.log(`ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼PDF: ${resourceId} -> ${htmlFilename}`);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½

  // å¤„ç†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'
      ? `æ¨èè¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ç»æœŸå¥åº·èµ„æºï¼š${resource.title}`
      : `Check out this helpful menstrual health resource: ${resource.title}`;

    const shareData = {
      title: `Period Hub - ${resource.title}`,
      text: shareText,
      url: window.location.href
    };

    try {
      if (navigator.share && navigator.canShare && navigator.canShare(shareData)) {
        await navigator.share(shareData);
      } else {
        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥:', error);
      // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
      try {
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      } catch (clipboardError) {
        console.error('å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥:', clipboardError);
      }
    }
  };

  // æ™ºèƒ½æœç´¢ç®—æ³•
  const semanticSearch = useMemo(() => {
    // æ•´åˆ6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯çš„è¯­ä¹‰æ˜ å°„
    const urgentKeywords = [
      // 6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯åŠå…¶åŒä¹‰è¯
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.core'),
      // ä¸“ä¸šæœ¯è¯­æ˜ å°„
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.professional'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.massage'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.medication'),
      // å…¶ä»–ç´§æ€¥ç›¸å…³è¯æ±‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.emergency')
    ];
    
    const preparationKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.massage')
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.medication')
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.medication')
    ];

    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    if (urgentKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      [t('tags.heatTherapy')]: [t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment2'), t('tags.warmWaterBottle'), t('tags.warmPatch')],
      [t('tags.massage')]: [t('tags.acupressure'), t('tags.muscleRelaxation'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage'), t('tags.bellyRub')],
      [t('tags.painkiller')]: [t('tags.nsaid'), t('tags.antiInflammatoryDrug'), t('tags.ibuprofen'), t('tags.acetaminophen'), t('tags.painMedication'), t('tags.medication')],
      [t('tags.warmPatch')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')],
      [t('tags.bellyRub')]: [t('tags.massage'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage')],
      [t('tags.warmWaterBottle')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')]
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {

    const learningKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.medication')
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.medication')
    ];

    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    if (urgentKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      [t('tags.heatTherapy')]: [t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment2'), t('tags.warmWaterBottle'), t('tags.warmPatch')],
      [t('tags.massage')]: [t('tags.acupressure'), t('tags.muscleRelaxation'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage'), t('tags.bellyRub')],
      [t('tags.painkiller')]: [t('tags.nsaid'), t('tags.antiInflammatoryDrug'), t('tags.ibuprofen'), t('tags.acetaminophen'), t('tags.painMedication'), t('tags.medication')],
      [t('tags.warmPatch')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')],
      [t('tags.bellyRub')]: [t('tags.massage'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage')],
      [t('tags.warmWaterBottle')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')]
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  // æ¸è¿›å¼åŠ è½½

    return badges[priority as keyof typeof badges] || badges.low;

  // PDFæ–‡ä»¶åè·å– - ä»ç»Ÿä¸€é…ç½®è·å–
  const getPDFFilename = (resourceId: string): string => {
    // ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨resourceIdï¼Œå› ä¸ºPDFèµ„æºå·²ç»ä½¿ç”¨äº†é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ­£ç¡®ID

  const handlePDFDownload = (resourceId: string) => {
    // ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼çš„PDFå†…å®¹ï¼Œæä¾›æ›´å¥½çš„å±å¹•é˜…è¯»ä½“éªŒ
    const htmlFilename = `${resourceId}.html`;
    const url = `/pdf-files/${htmlFilename}`;

    console.log(`ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼PDF: ${resourceId} -> ${htmlFilename}`);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = htmlFilename;
    link.target = '_blank';
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();

  };

  // å¤„ç†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'
      ? `æ¨èè¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ç»æœŸå¥åº·èµ„æºï¼š${resource.title}`

    const shareData = {
      title: `Period Hub - ${resource.title}`,
      text: shareText,
      url: window.location.href
    };

    try {
      if (navigator.share && navigator.canShare && navigator.canShare(shareData)) {
        await navigator.share(shareData);
      } else {
        // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥:', error);
      // é™çº§åˆ°å¤åˆ¶é“¾æ¥
      try {
        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);

  "faq": {
    "title": "Frequently Asked Questions",
    "subtitle": "Find answers to common questions about menstrual health",
    "q1": {
      "question": "What are the fastest ways to relieve menstrual cramps?",
      "answer": "The fastest menstrual cramp relief methods include: heat therapy on lower abdomen and back, gentle abdominal massage, light exercise like yoga, NSAIDs like ibuprofen, and adequate rest. Combining multiple methods works best."
    },
    "q2": {
      "question": "What is considered a normal menstrual cycle?",
      "answer": "A normal menstrual cycle ranges from 21-35 days, with an average of 28 days. Menstruation typically lasts 3-7 days. Consult a gynecologist if cycles are consistently irregular."
    },
    "q3": {
      "question": "How does Traditional Chinese Medicine treat irregular periods?",
      "answer": "TCM treats irregular periods through syndrome differentiation: acupuncture to regulate qi and blood, herbal formulas, dietary therapy, and lifestyle adjustments. Professional TCM diagnosis is needed for personalized treatment."
    },
    "q4": {
      "question": "When is the most effective time to take Ibuprofen?",
      "answer": "Ibuprofen is most effective when taken at the onset of pain, typically taking effect in 30-60 minutes. It's recommended to take it when pain first starts or when you anticipate pain coming, rather than waiting until the pain becomes severe."
    },
    "q5": {
      "question": "How many times can I take Ibuprofen per day?",
      "answer": "Ibuprofen can be taken every 6-8 hours, up to 4 times per day. Adult single dose is 200-400mg, with a maximum total daily dose of 2400mg. Do not use continuously for more than 3 days; consult a doctor if pain persists."
    },
    "q6": {
      "question": "Which has fewer side effects: Naproxen or Ibuprofen?",
      "answer": "Naproxen typically has fewer side effects because it's taken less frequently (every 8-12 hours). However, both may cause stomach discomfort, so it's recommended to take with food. Those with stomach, heart, or kidney/liver problems should use with caution."
    },
    "q7": {
      "question": "Can I take both Ibuprofen and Naproxen together for period pain?",
      "answer": "It's not recommended to take both Ibuprofen and Naproxen together as they are both NSAIDs, which increases the risk of side effects. Choose one medication, and if it's not effective, consult a doctor to adjust your medication plan."
    }
  },

}

  name: string;
  nameEn: string;
  duration: number;
  color: string;
}

export default function BreathingExercise({ locale }: BreathingExerciseProps) {
  const t = useTranslations('breathingExercise');
  const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false);
  const [currentPhase, setCurrentPhase] = useState(0);
  const [timeLeft, setTimeLeft] = useState(0);
  const [isComplete, setIsComplete] = useState(false);

  const phases: Phase[] = [
    {
      name: t('phases.inhale'),
      nameEn: 'Inhale',
      duration: 4,
      color: 'bg-blue-600'
    },
    {
      name: t('phases.hold'),
      nameEn: 'Hold',
      duration: 7,
      color: 'bg-purple-600'
    },
    {
      name: t('phases.exhale'),
      nameEn: 'Exhale',
      duration: 8,
      color: 'bg-pink-600'
    }
  ];

  useEffect(() => {
    let interval: NodeJS.Timeout;

    if (isActive && timeLeft > 0) {
      interval = setInterval(() => {
        setTimeLeft(timeLeft - 1);
      }, 1000);
    } else if (isActive && timeLeft === 0) {
      if (currentPhase < phases.length - 1) {
        // Move to next phase
        setTimeout(() => {
          setCurrentPhase(currentPhase + 1);
          setTimeLeft(phases[currentPhase + 1].duration);

        // Complete the cycle
        setIsActive(false);
        setIsComplete(true);
        setCurrentPhase(0);
      }

    return () => clearInterval(interval);

  const [currentPhase, setCurrentPhase] = useState(0);
  const [timeLeft, setTimeLeft] = useState(0);
  const [isComplete, setIsComplete] = useState(false);

  const phases: Phase[] = [
    {
      name: t('phases.inhale'),
      nameEn: 'Inhale',
      duration: 4,
      color: 'bg-blue-600'
    },

      name: t('phases.hold'),
      nameEn: 'Hold',
      duration: 7,
      color: 'bg-purple-600'
    },
    {
      name: t('phases.exhale'),
      nameEn: 'Exhale',
      duration: 8,
      color: 'bg-pink-600'
    }
  ];

  useEffect(() => {
    let interval: NodeJS.Timeout;

    if (isActive && timeLeft > 0) {
      interval = setInterval(() => {
        setTimeLeft(timeLeft - 1);

    },

      duration: 8,
      color: 'bg-pink-600'
    }
  ];

    let interval: NodeJS.Timeout;

  name: string;
  nameEn: string;
  duration: number;
  color: string;
}

export default function BreathingExercise({ locale }: BreathingExerciseProps) {
  const t = useTranslations('breathingExercise');
  const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false);
  const [currentPhase, setCurrentPhase] = useState(0);
  const [timeLeft, setTimeLeft] = useState(0);
  const [isComplete, setIsComplete] = useState(false);

  const phases: Phase[] = [
    {
      name: t('phases.inhale'),
      nameEn: 'Inhale',
      duration: 4,
      color: 'bg-blue-600'
    },
    {
      name: t('phases.hold'),
      nameEn: 'Hold',
      duration: 7,
      color: 'bg-purple-600'
    },
    {
      name: t('phases.exhale'),
      nameEn: 'Exhale',
      duration: 8,
      color: 'bg-pink-600'
    }
  ];

  useEffect(() => {
    let interval: NodeJS.Timeout;

    if (isActive && timeLeft > 0) {
      interval = setInterval(() => {
        setTimeLeft(timeLeft - 1);
      }, 1000);
    } else if (isActive && timeLeft === 0) {
      if (currentPhase < phases.length - 1) {
        // Move to next phase
        setTimeout(() => {
          setCurrentPhase(currentPhase + 1);
          setTimeLeft(phases[currentPhase + 1].duration);
        }, 500);
      } else {
        // Complete the cycle
        setIsActive(false);
        setIsComplete(true);
        setCurrentPhase(0);
      }
    }

    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, [isActive, timeLeft, currentPhase, phases]);

  const startExercise = () => {
    setIsActive(true);
    setIsComplete(false);
    setCurrentPhase(0);
    setTimeLeft(phases[0].duration);

    setCurrentPhase(0);

  const semanticSearch = useMemo(() => {
    // æ•´åˆ6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯çš„è¯­ä¹‰æ˜ å°„
    const urgentKeywords = [
      // 6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯åŠå…¶åŒä¹‰è¯

      // ä¸“ä¸šæœ¯è¯­æ˜ å°„
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.professional'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.massage'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.medication'),
      // å…¶ä»–ç´§æ€¥ç›¸å…³è¯æ±‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.emergency')
    ];
    
    const preparationKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.massage')
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.medication')
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.medication')
    ];

    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    if (urgentKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      [t('tags.heatTherapy')]: [t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment2'), t('tags.warmWaterBottle'), t('tags.warmPatch')],
      [t('tags.massage')]: [t('tags.acupressure'), t('tags.muscleRelaxation'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage'), t('tags.bellyRub')],
      [t('tags.painkiller')]: [t('tags.nsaid'), t('tags.antiInflammatoryDrug'), t('tags.ibuprofen'), t('tags.acetaminophen'), t('tags.painMedication'), t('tags.medication')],
      [t('tags.warmPatch')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')],
      [t('tags.bellyRub')]: [t('tags.massage'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage')],
      [t('tags.warmWaterBottle')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')]
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

  // PDFæ–‡ä»¶åè·å– - ä»ç»Ÿä¸€é…ç½®è·å–
  const getPDFFilename = (resourceId: string): string => {
    // ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨resourceIdï¼Œå› ä¸ºPDFèµ„æºå·²ç»ä½¿ç”¨äº†é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„æ­£ç¡®ID

  // å¤„ç†HTMLæ ¼å¼PDFä¸‹è½½
  const handlePDFDownload = (resourceId: string) => {
    // ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼çš„PDFå†…å®¹ï¼Œæä¾›æ›´å¥½çš„å±å¹•é˜…è¯»ä½“éªŒ
    const htmlFilename = `${resourceId}.html`;
    const url = `/pdf-files/${htmlFilename}`;

    console.log(`ä¸‹è½½HTMLæ ¼å¼PDF: ${resourceId} -> ${htmlFilename}`);

    // åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = htmlFilename;

    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);

  // å¤„ç†åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½
  const handleShare = async (resource: Resource) => {
    const shareText = locale === 'zh'
      ? `æ¨èè¿™ä¸ªæœ‰ç”¨çš„ç»æœŸå¥åº·èµ„æºï¼š${resource.title}`
      : `Check out this helpful menstrual health resource: ${resource.title}`;

    const shareData = {
      title: `Period Hub - ${resource.title}`,
      text: shareText,
      url: window.location.href
    };

    try {
      if (navigator.share && navigator.canShare && navigator.canShare(shareData)) {

  const semanticSearch = useMemo(() => {
    // æ•´åˆ6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯çš„è¯­ä¹‰æ˜ å°„
    const urgentKeywords = [
      // 6ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒå…³é”®è¯åŠå…¶åŒä¹‰è¯
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.core'),
      // ä¸“ä¸šæœ¯è¯­æ˜ å°„

      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.massage'),
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.medication'),
      // å…¶ä»–ç´§æ€¥ç›¸å…³è¯æ±‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.urgent.emergency')
    ];
    
    const preparationKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç›¸å…³å‡†å¤‡
      ...t('searchKeywords.preparation.massage')
    ];
    
    const learningKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©å­¦ä¹ 
      ...t('searchKeywords.learning.medication')
    ];
    
    const managementKeywords = [
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.core'),
      // çƒ­æ•·ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.heatTherapy'),
      // æŒ‰æ‘©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.massage'),
      // è¯ç‰©ç®¡ç†
      ...t('searchKeywords.management.medication')
    ];

    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();

    if (urgentKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'immediate', boost: true };
    } else if (preparationKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'preparation', boost: false };
    } else if (learningKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'learning', boost: false };
    } else if (managementKeywords.some(keyword => term.includes(keyword))) {
      return { category: 'management', boost: false };
    }

    return null;
  }, [searchTerm]);

  // å†…å®¹æœç´¢é€»è¾‘ - æœç´¢èµ„æºæ ‡é¢˜ã€æ ‡ç­¾ç­‰
  // æ™ºèƒ½å†…å®¹æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ - æ”¯æŒæ¨¡ç³ŠåŒ¹é…å’Œè¯­ä¹‰ç†è§£
  const contentSearch = useMemo(() => {
    if (!searchTerm) return null;

    const term = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
    const allResources = Object.values(optimizedCategories).flatMap(category => category.resources);

    // å®šä¹‰åŒä¹‰è¯æ˜ å°„è¡¨
    const synonymMap: Record<string, string[]> = {
      [t('tags.heatTherapy')]: [t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment2'), t('tags.warmWaterBottle'), t('tags.warmPatch')],
      [t('tags.massage')]: [t('tags.acupressure'), t('tags.muscleRelaxation'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage'), t('tags.bellyRub')],
      [t('tags.painkiller')]: [t('tags.nsaid'), t('tags.antiInflammatoryDrug'), t('tags.ibuprofen'), t('tags.acetaminophen'), t('tags.painMedication'), t('tags.medication')],
      [t('tags.warmPatch')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')],
      [t('tags.bellyRub')]: [t('tags.massage'), t('tags.abdominalMassage'), t('tags.menstrualMassage'), t('tags.painMassage')],
      [t('tags.warmWaterBottle')]: [t('tags.heatTherapy'), t('tags.heatTherapyMethod'), t('tags.heatTherapyTreatment')]
    };

    // è·å–æœç´¢è¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŒä¹‰è¯
    const getSynonyms = (searchTerm: string): string[] => {
      const synonyms: string[] = [searchTerm];
      for (const [key, values] of Object.entries(synonymMap)) {
        if (key.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(key)) {
          synonyms.push(...values);
        }
        if (values.some(v => v.includes(searchTerm) || searchTerm.includes(v))) {
          synonyms.push(key, ...values);
        }
      }
      return [...new Set(synonyms)]; // å»é‡
    };

    const synonyms = getSynonyms(term);
    
    // è®¡ç®—èµ„æºç›¸å…³æ€§è¯„åˆ† - ä¿®å¤è¯„åˆ†ç®—æ³•
    const calculateRelevanceScore = (resource: any): number => {
      const searchableText = [
        resource.title,
        resource.tags.join(' '),
        resource.type
      ].join(' ').toLowerCase();

      let score = 0;
      let maxPossibleScore = 0;
      
      // ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…å¾—åˆ†æœ€é«˜ (100åˆ†)
      if (searchableText.includes(term)) {
        score += 100;
        maxPossibleScore = 100;
      } else {
        // åŒä¹‰è¯åŒ¹é… (80åˆ†)
        let synonymMatch = false;
        synonyms.forEach(synonym => {
          if (searchableText.includes(synonym.toLowerCase())) {
            score += 80;
            synonymMatch = true;
          }
        });
        
        if (synonymMatch) {
          maxPossibleScore = 80;
        } else {
          // éƒ¨åˆ†åŒ¹é… (30åˆ†)
          if (term.length >= 2) {
            for (let i = 0; i <= term.length - 2; i++) {
              const substring = term.substring(i, i + 2);
              if (searchableText.includes(substring)) {
                score += 30;
                maxPossibleScore = 30;
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          
          // æ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é… (20åˆ†)
          resource.tags.forEach((tag: string) => {
            const tagLower = tag.toLowerCase();
            if (tagLower.includes(term) || term.includes(tagLower)) {
              score += 20;
              if (maxPossibleScore < 20) maxPossibleScore = 20;
            }
          });
        }
      }
      
      // ç¡®ä¿åˆ†æ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡100
      return Math.min(score, 100);
    };

    // è¿‡æ»¤å¹¶è¯„åˆ†
    const scoredResources = allResources
      .map(resource => ({
        ...resource,
        relevanceScore: calculateRelevanceScore(resource)
      }))
      .filter(resource => resource.relevanceScore > 0)
      .sort((a, b) => b.relevanceScore - a.relevanceScore);

    return scoredResources;
  }, [searchTerm, optimizedCategories]);

        await navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.location.href);
        alert('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼');
      }
    } catch (error) {
